Job Description:
Job Description :   
  Software Developer will be responsible for design,  development,  integration,  testing and deployment of the Software Development projects. 
   Necessary Skills/  Qualifications :   
 
  - - -  In- depth knowledge of D2K,  VB are essential 
  - - -  Must possess excellent problem solving skills. 
 
 
  - - -  Excellent communication skills to interact with other groups in the organization. Capable of completing projects in a given time frame 
 
 
  - - -  They should be able to work independently. 
  - - -  Candidates with related work experience of 1- 3 years would be preferred.
